title: Plan for different workloads types
description: ADX supports in place sharing of data
details: Azure Data Explorer decouples the storage and compute which allows customers to run multiple compute (read-only) instances on the same underlying storage. You can attach a database as a follower database, which is a read-only database on a remote cluster

documentation.title: Use Azure Data Share to share data with Azure Data Explorer

title: Implement a GDPR plan
details: As a data platform, Azure Data Explorer supports the ability to delete individual records, through the use of Kusto .purge and related commands.
